text: Yaru Railway Station (, Balochi: یارو ریلوے اسٹیشن) is located in Yaru village, Pishin district of Balochistan province of the Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Pishin District Category:Railway stations on Rohri–Chaman Railway Line
title: Yaru railway station
